overview: The mysterious and deadly Nodding Syndrome has affected thousands of children in Northern Uganda, leaving them hovering in a zombie-like state between life and death. Angwech Collines saw her own childhood despair in the eyes of these children and was compelled to act. In a race against time, can she save the next generation of Ugandaâ€™s youth from this killer condition, in the face of bureaucracy, poverty, and superstition?
title: A Question of Humanity
